definition: residence/(coll.) to stay in at home/to hang around at home

sentences.english: People say that the old house is haunted by a ghost.
sentences.chinese: 據說那棟舊宅裏有鬼出沒。

sentences.english: It was a weird old house.
sentences.chinese: 這是所神祕而可怕的舊宅。

definition: grave/tomb/graveyard/cemetery/fig. one's native place (where one's ancestors are buried)
Shilong district of Pingdingshan city 平頂山市|平顶山市[Ping2 ding3 shan1 shi4], Henan
a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom); everything has its ancestral home/In old age, an expatriate longs to return home.
to go on a hunting expedition
the people are gone and the place is empty (idiom)/the sight of a deserted place brings old friends to mind/the place is deserted/the birds have flown
Linqing county level city in Liaocheng 聊城[Liao2 cheng2], Shandong
Linhe district of Bayan Nur city 巴彥淖爾市|巴彦淖尔市[Ba1 yan4 nao4 er3 shi4], Inner Mongolia
